SawyerController.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 """
3 This is a sawyer pose library, this is comprised of three main types of classes
4 1) General Utilities: defs utilized by all classes
5 2) Static Defs: All defs starting with static.
6  Used only for static data collection
7 3) dynamic Defs: All defs starting with dynamic.
8  Used for dynamic data collection only
9 Each Pose should be defined in this way
10 poses_list = [
11  [[-1, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4],
12  [0, 0, 0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_1'],
13  [[-0.5, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4],
14  [0, 0, -0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_2']
15  ]
16 Which is basically:
17 poses_list = [
18  [[Position List_1], [Velocity_list_1], 'Pose_name_1'],
19  [[Position List_2], [Velocity_list_2], 'Pose_name_2']
20  ]
21 """
22 import rospy
23 from math import pi
24 import numpy as np
25 
26 import intera_interface
27 
28 
29 class SawyerController(object):
30  """
31  This is the main SawyerPose class.
32  The main reason this class needs to be overridden is
33  that you can rospy.init_node
34  once. Hence. You need to call this super method.
35  """
36 
37  def __init__(self, limb="right"):
38  """
39  SawyerController class. Currently tested in simulation.
40 
41  Arguments
42  ---------
43  `limb`: `str`
44  The limb string used to initialize
45  `self._limb.`
46 
47  """
48  # Create Publishers and Init Node
49  rospy.init_node('sawyer_controller', anonymous=True)
50  # Set Initial position of the robot
51  self._limb = intera_interface.Limb(limb)
52  self._rs = intera_interface.RobotEnable(intera_interface.CHECK_VERSION)
53  self._init_state = self._rs.state().enabled
54  self._rs.enable()
55 
56  self.positions = {name: 0.0 for name in self._limb.joint_names()}
57  self.velocities = {name: 0.0 for name in self._limb.joint_names()}
58 
59  try:
60  self._limb.set_joint_positions(self.positions)
61  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
62  print('Set Joint Velocities Failed')
63 
64  self.sleep_time_static = rospy.get_param('/static_sleep_time')
65  self.r = rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param('/dynamic_frequency'))
66  self.pose_name = ''
67 
68  @property
69  def joint_names(self):
70  """
71  Gets the joint names of the Sawyer robot.
72  """
73  return self._limb.joint_names()
74 
75  @property
76  def joint_angles(self):
77  """
78  Gets the current joint angles of the Sawyer robot.
79  """
80  return self._limb.joint_angles()
81 
82  @property
83  def joint_velocities(self):
84  """
85  Gets the current joint velocities of the Sawyer robot.
86  """
87  return self._limb.joint_velocities()
88 
89  def joint_angle(self, joint_name):
90  """
91  Gets the joint angle for the Sawyer's
92  corresponding joint name.
93 
94  Arguments
95  ---------
96  `joint_name`: `str`
97  The name of the joint on the Panda.
98 
99  """
100  return self._limb.joint_angle(joint_name)
101 
102  def joint_velocity(self, joint_name):
103  """
104  Gets the joint velocity for the Sawyer's
105  corresponding joint name.
106 
107  Arguments
108  ---------
109  `joint_name`: `str`
110  The name of the joint on the Panda.
111 
112  """
113  return self._limb.joint_velocity(joint_name)
114 
115  def set_joint_position_speed(self, speed=1.0):
116  """
117  Sets the joint position speed for Sawyer.
118 
119  Arguments
120  ---------
121  `speed`: `float`
122  The speed in rad/s of the joints.
123 
124  """
125  return self._limb.set_joint_position_speed(speed=speed)
126 
127  def publish_positions(self, positions, sleep):
128  """
129  Set joint positions of the sawyer
130 
131  Arguments
132  ----------
133  positions: list
134  Set the joint positions according to the list that you get
135  sleep: float
136  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
137 
138  Returns
139  ----------
140  return: None
141  """
142  if len(positions) != 7:
143  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, \
144  as sawyer has 7 joints.")
145 
146  for joint_name, position in zip(self._limb.joint_names(), positions):
147  self.positions[joint_name] = position
148 
149  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
150  try:
151  self._limb.move_to_joint_positions(self.positions,
152  timeout=sleep)
153  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
154  print('Set Joint Positions Failed')
155 
156  if sleep:
157  rospy.sleep(self.sleep_time_static)
158  else:
159  self.r.sleep()
160 
161  def publish_velocities(self, velocities, sleep=None):
162  """
163  Set joint velocities of the sawyer
164 
165  Arguments
166  ----------
167  positions: list
168  Set the joint velocities according to the list that you get
169  sleep: float
170  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
171 
172  Returns
173  ----------
174  return: None
175  """
176  if len(velocities) != 7:
177  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, \
178  as sawyer has 7 arms")
179 
180  for joint_name, velocity in zip(self._limb.joint_names(), velocities):
181  self.velocities[joint_name] = velocity
182 
183  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
184  try:
185  self._limb.set_joint_velocities(self.velocities)
186  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
187  print('Set Joint Velocities Failed')
188 
189  if sleep:
190  rospy.sleep(self.sleep_time_static)
191  else:
192  self.r.sleep()
193 
194  def publish_trajectory(self, positions, velocities, accelerations, sleep):
195  """
196  Set joint trajectory (positions and velocities) of the sawyer
197 
198  Arguments
199  ----------
200  positions: list
201  Set the joint positions according to the list that you get
202  velocities: list
203  Set the joint velocities according to the list that you get
204  sleep: float
205  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
206 
207  Returns
208  ----------
209  return: None
210  """
211  if len(positions) != 7:
212  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, \
213  as sawyer has 7 joints")
214  if len(velocities) != 7:
215  raise Exception("The length of input list should be 7, \
216  as sawyer has 7 joints")
217 
218  for joint_name, position, velocity \
219  in zip(self._limb.joint_names(), positions, velocities):
220  self.positions[joint_name] = position
221  self.velocities[joint_name] = velocity
222 
223  if not rospy.is_shutdown():
224  try:
225  self._limb.set_joint_trajectory(self._limb.joint_names(),
226  positions,
227  velocities,
228  accelerations)
229  except rospy.ROSInternalException:
230  print('Set Joint Trajectory Failed')
231 
232  if sleep:
233  rospy.sleep(self.sleep_time_static)
234  else:
235  self.r.sleep()
236 
237  # End General Utilities
238  def set_positions_list(self, poses, sleep):
239  """
240  Set joint poses (positions)
241 
242  Arguments
243  ----------
244  poses: Special Data Structure
245  Loop through all the positions and velocities in the poses
246  poses = [pose, pose, ..., pose]
247  pose = [positions, velocities, string]
248  sleep: float
249  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
250 
251  Returns
252  --------
253  return: None
254  """
255  for pose in poses:
256  positions, _, pose_name = pose[0], pose[1], pose[2] # noqa: F841
257  self.pose_name = pose_name
258  self.publish_positions(positions, sleep)
259 
260  def set_velocities_list(self, poses, sleep=None):
261  """
262  Set poses (velocities)
263 
264  Arguments
265  ----------
266  poses: Special Data Structure
267  Loop through all the positions and velocities in the poses
268  poses = [pose, pose, ..., pose]
269  pose = [positions, velocities, string]
270  sleep: float
271  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
272 
273  Returns
274  --------
275  return: None
276  """
277  for each_pose in poses:
278  _, velocities, pose_name = each_pose[0], each_pose[1], each_pose[2] # noqa: F841,E501
279  self.pose_name = pose_name
280  self.publish_velocities(velocities, sleep)
281 
282  def set_trajectory_list(self, poses, sleep=None):
283  """
284  Set poses (positions and velocities)
285 
286  Arguments
287  ----------
288  poses: Special Data Structure
289  Loop through all the positions and velocities in the poses
290  poses = [pose, pose, ..., pose]
291  pose = [positions, velocities, string]
292  sleep: float
293  Set how long it should wait after commanding a command
294 
295  Returns
296  --------
297  return: None
298  """
299  # TODO: add accelerations
300  for each_pose in poses:
301  positions, velocities, pose_name = \
302  each_pose[0], each_pose[1], each_pose[2]
303  accelerations = np.zeros(7)
304  self.pose_name = pose_name
305  self.publish_trajectory(positions,
306  velocities, accelerations, sleep)
307 
308 
309 if __name__ == "__main__":
310  poses_list = [
311  [[-1, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4],
312  [0, 0, 0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_1'],
313  [[-0.5, -pi / 3, -pi / 4, 1, 1, 1, -pi / 4],
314  [0, 0, -0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0], 'Pose_2']
315  ]
316  controller = SawyerController()
317  controller.publish_positions([0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0], 5)
